column1: ROAD TO ASIAN GAMES28 NOV - 2 DECPALEMBANG, INDONESIA

column10: Teams are break into 4 Groups of 3 or 4 each.
Teams will be playing a round robin format where the top 2 of each group will play in the Quarter Final round
Winner of the Quarter Finals will qualify to Semi Finals and followed into Final.
Loser of the Semi Finals will qualify for Double Bronze
Loser of Prelimiaries, Quarter Finals will proceed into a ranking pool matches
Top 2 of each group will advance to a cross Quarter Finals.
Group A will cross with Group B
Group C will cross with Group D
Group A will cross with Group D
Group C will cross with Group B
Teams will play in a round robin format.
